suppress.notes:
file name: tempusdominus-bootstrap-4.min.js This is the Tempus Dominus datetime picker plugin, not Bootstrap itself. False positive identification by dependency-check.
The OWASP Dependency Check incorrectly identifies this file as Bootstrap 4.min due to the filename containing "bootstrap-4". These CVEs are related to Bootstrap, not to Tempus Dominus.
We have updated the actual Bootstrap files (bootstrap4.6.2.min.js) which fixes these vulnerabilities. This suppression ONLY applies to the tempusdominus file based on the exact filename match.
